page.title: 05Leisure Activities
page.content: The children in Blisland have lots of hobbies some of them are horseriding, boxing, computers, collecting rubbers, collecting posters, tennis, guides and cubs.The most popular hobbies are horseriding and collecting rubbers. Rubber collecting isn't very expensive. You buy them in shops. They are all different shapes, sizes and colours. People also like reading.They like Enid Blyton and Roald Dahl.Lots of people have or ride horses.People go to gymkhanas and hunts.Riding is quite difficult at first but after a while it is easy.The moors are a very good place for riding because there is a lot of open space.
